TestDescription.name: Cross site scripting vulnerability in ZeroClipboard.swf
TestDescription.Description: The ZeroClipboard library provides an easy way to copy text to the clipboard using an invisible Adobe Flash movie and a JavaScript interface. A cross site scripting vulnerability was reported in older versions of the ZeroClipboard library that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary Javascript code.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of ZeroClipboard.
